ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: You get the basics plus a little more in this class. It's mostly a policy class. I would have appreciated a bit more on the technical side.
Any student exploring a career in public policy should take this course as a introduction to the complex issue of cybersecurity.
I would recommend the course to a fellow student since it provides a great way to understand cyber security issues from a global perspective.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This will better prepare me for a career in policy, as cyber will be an evermore important subject going forward.
This course directly contributed to my professional goals

It helped me to better see these issues from the perspective of someone who is not an American citizen. My background had taught me to be concerned mainly with the American interests, but discussions in this class showed me other perspectives (mainly European). For example, I now know why there is a higher demand in the European market for encryption tools after the NSA scandal.
